blog.description: hi I’m jay and this is just a place for me to keep all my saved pictures of park jimin. I do not own any of this content!!!

summary: happy birthday park jimin!!!!!!!!!!!!  I’ve been in this fandom less than a year now and well there’s a reason I created this...
body: happy birthday park jimin!!!!!!!!!!!! I’ve been in this fandom less than a year now and well there’s a reason I created this page. this man is one of the most uplifting, precious, and adorable people to be in the spotlight, and I’m more than proud of everything this group has accomplished and all those they’ve helped and inspired. here’s to another year of a wonderful life ❤️❤️❤️

blog.name: jeonjungkooks-blog
blog.title: bts ed
blog.description: hey, you found me. now go far away from my toxic life. i can't let my life ruin yours.

summary: You may not see me nor know me, but you are the star to my constellation. You are the reason I smile and aspire to me nice to...
body:
Happy birthday to my ana inspiration, Jimin.

You may not see me nor know me, but you are the star to my constellation. You are the reason I smile and aspire to me nice to others. However, I’m sorry, I’m sorry that I am using you as my ana inspiration I’m sorry that I don’t eat cause you didn’t eat I’m sorry I’m following your diet and I’m sorry for letting you down. You didn’t want me to do this but I have to. You are my biggest inspiration and you must regret telling us about the diet knowing that people will do it. But it’s not your fault. I love you. And I will promise to recover, but for now I don’t see recovery anyway. I need to be thin….just like you baby. I love you. Happy birthday.

And I will promise to recover, but for now I don’t see recovery anyway. I need to be thin….just like you baby. I love you. Happy birthday.

And I will promise to recover, but for now I don’t see recovery anyway. I need to be thin….just like you baby. I love you. Happy birthday.
